titleStmt.title: An useful tractate to further Christians of these dangerous and back-sliding times, in the practice of the most needful duty of prayer Wherein are discover'd the nature, necessity and successe of fervent prayer: many objections answered, several practical cases of conscience resolved; and all briefly applied from this text, viz. James 5. 16. The effectual fervent-prayer of a righteous man availeth much. Being the substance of several sermons preached in the town of Columpton in Devon. / By William Crompton M.A. minister of that part of Christs Church there.
titleStmt.author: Crompton, William, 1599?-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for Philemon Stephens, at the Gilded Lion in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A treatise of prayer.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
